original_text: Then Boaz said to the elders and all the people, “You are witnesses this day that I have bought from the hand of Naomi all that belonged to Elimelech and all that belonged to Chilion and to Mahlon.
korean_text: 보아스가 장로들과 모든 백성에게 이르되 내가 엘리멜렉과 기룐과 말론에게 있던 모든 것을 나오미의 손에서 산 일에 너희가 오늘 증인이 되었고

sentences.original_text: Then Boaz said to the elders and all the people,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 보아스가 장로들과 모든 백성에게 말하여 이르되,

sentences.original_text: that I have bought from the hand of Naomi
and all that belonged to Chilion and to Mahlon.
sentences.korean_translation: 글룐과 말론에게 속한 모든 것을 샀음을.
